name: Animalism
description: The ability to communicate with and control the beasts of the world, tapping into the Beast within both animal and Kindred.

name: Auspex
description: Supernatural perception that pierces lies, senses emotions, and can even project consciousness beyond the physical form.

name: Celerity
description: Unearthly speed and reflexes, allowing a vampire to move faster than the mortal eye can follow.

name: Chimerstry
description: The power to conjure illusions and phantoms so real they can deceive all senses and even cause physical harm.

name: Dementation
description: The ability to channel madness, shattering the minds of others and inflicting derangements with but a word or a glance.

name: Dominate
description: The power to subjugate the will of others, commanding them with irresistible mental force and altering their memories.

name: Fortitude
description: Supernatural resilience and toughness, allowing a vampire to endure injuries that would destroy a mortal body.

name: Necromancy
description: The dark art of communing with and commanding the spirits of the dead, and wielding the very essence of the Underworld.

name: Obfuscate
description: The ability to cloud the minds of others, becoming unseen and unheard while standing in plain sight.

name: Obtenebration
description: The mastery over shadows and darkness, shaping them into tangible, animate forms and weapons of chilling abyss.

name: Potence
description: The unholy might of the vampiric curse, granting physical strength far beyond mortal limits.

name: Presence
description: An aura of supernatural charisma and emotional magnetism that can inspire awe, terror, or slavish devotion in others.

name: Protean
description: The power of metamorphosis, allowing a vampire to change their form, grow bestial claws, or even meld into the very earth.

name: Quietus
description: The silent art of the kill, using accursed blood to silence sounds, poison victims, and inflict agonizing death.

name: Serpentis
description: A discipline that channels the corrupting influence of the serpent, allowing for hypnotic gazes, scaly skin, and a venomous bite.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: The arcane practice of blood magic, manipulating the power of Vitae to create a wide variety of devastating and subtle effects.

name: Vicissitude
description: The unnatural art of fleshcrafting, allowing the user to warp and reshape bone and tissue—both their own and that of others.
